{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=C6250 |asin=B0111MRLLG |newegg=N82E16825124014 |fcc_date=12/24/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=PY314300292 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM33843;QAMLink, BCM33843GKFSBG, CN1425 P20, 393211 N3; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125:K |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217;BCM43217TKMLG, HD1429 P11, 401558 1 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=5GHz RF Front End Module (FEM);Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4591F;FMF, 4591, NL3X;3; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X4 - AC1600 Wi-Fi Cable Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/C6250.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=C6250}} DOCSIS 3.0 16x4{{CableModemSpec |down_c=16 |up_c=4 }} "D9PTK" [https://www.micron.com/support/tools-and-utilities/fbga?fbga=D9PTK FBGA code] on the RAM corresponds to the MT41K128M16JT-125:K ==Likely compatible services== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=443 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) *{{Approved by service|Spectrum}} (on [http://www.spectrum.net/support/internet/compliant-modems-charter-network/ '''Spectrum''' certified modems list]) *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} (not yet on [https://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/twc-compatible-modems.pdf '''Time Warner Cable''' compatible modems list]) *{{Approved by service|Cox}} (likely on [https://www.cox.com/residential/support/cox-certified-cable-modems.html '''Cox''' certified modems list] as the 16x4 C6220) "U12C326 REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. * Web GUI: http://routerlogin.net ===See Also=== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] *[[Netgear C6220]] *[[Netgear C6300]]
